awd_titl_txt: Earth Sciences Component of Interdisciplinary Hydrology     Major
awd_abstract_narration: This award to the University of New Hampshire at Durham is                 made in response to a proposal submitted to the NSF's                           Instrumentation and Laboratory Improvement Program, a program                   whose goal is to extend support for undergraduate instructional                 instrumentation. The award will provide one-half of the funds                   needed to acquire field and laboratory instrumentation for a                    newly reformulated hydrology curriculum. The University  of New                 Hampshire is committed to matching the NSF contribution for this                equipment.                                                                           The instrumentation will be used to enhance the                            undergraduate hydrology curriculum and to provide practical                     training in the use of modern environmental instrumentation.
